welcome_message_body: Welcome to Stratford-upon-Avon, a charming city known for its rich history and connection to the famous playwright, William Shakespeare. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The smaller terminal at Birmingham Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gloucestershire Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Raf Brize Norton Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Raf Brize Norton Airport is used exclusively by the Royal Air Force.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a password is required for access.
